name: 20 Seconds to Destroy the World
description:
You are a billionaire at the top of the 21st century's biggest company. 
But an angry mob has had enough and is about to break into your office. 
Secure as many funds as possible before getting into your rocket to Mars!

- Lobby for lower climate goals.
- Get a good deal for oil.
- Trigger a war to sell weapons.
- Create a greenwashing company.
- Close the shuttle's door.
- Launch for Mars before the peasants enter the office.

Tip: if you experience lag, try another browser, close all other tabs and programs, or download the Windows build.

Tip: 20 seconds is short. If you feel overwhelmed, try doing one challenge at a time until you get good at it.
